content: The main referrer is Veronica Brusotti
The breakfast room is located in the kitchen
I remind you that juices, milk, cereals and other breakfast foods are available in the morning from Monday to Friday.
The kitchen is for everyone to use. If you drop an ingredient or get dirty, always try to clean it up.
Pots and pans can be found in the kitchen, but it is advisable to bring your own, as their presence is not guaranteed.
It is <b>strongly recommended</b< to bring your own cooking utensils.
In the kitchen, there is equipment such as: microwave, oven, toaster, blender, American type coffee machine.
Each week, you will find a table with the schedules to reserve the use of the washing machine and the dryer.
It is very important to remember to leave the washing machine door open when you are finished using it, otherwise the moisture will form mold.
In the common room, you will find a television, a ping-pong table and a table soccer.
